alert.note: Alert for Haines Borough and Lynn Canal; Taiya Inlet and Klondike Highway (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 05 at 7:53AM AKST until February 06 at 3:00PM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 3 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 3 PM AKST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 8 to 16 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph near White Pass resulting in local blowing and drifting snow. * WHERE...Haines and Klondike Highways. * WHEN...From 3 PM Saturday to 3 PM AKST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Greatest snowfall expected beyond 22 mile for the Haines Highway and beyond 8 mile for the Klondike Highway. Heavy rain is expected at sea level.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1 or visit 511.alaska.gov.

area.areaDesc: Haines Borough and Lynn Canal; Taiya Inlet and Klondike Highway
